pullrequest.title: Expanding the functionality of the plugin framework, and introducing PluginPtr and specializations

content.raw: There needs to be a point in the code where we choose which direction up the inheritance structure we need to go to find the base class that is specialized for the requested interface. You can think of it like going down a binary tree, and `DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_COMPOSEPLUGIN_DISPATCH` is where we make the choice of which branch to take for each different function that we need to implement.
content.html: There needs to be a point in the code where we choose which direction up the inheritance structure we need to go to find the base class that is specialized for the requested interface. You can think of it like going down a binary tree, and DETAIL_IGN_COMMON_COMPOSEPLUGIN_DISPATCH is where we make the choice of which branch to take for each different function that we need to implement.
